ai-tha-ap509:0.3_0: Because of his lack of fruit, giving and sharing the last fruit,
ai-tha-ap509:1.4_0: a sage is skilled in immersion.
ai-tha-ap509:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap509:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap509:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap509:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap509:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable identical fruit.
ai-tha-ap509:8.1_0: eat fruit of good deeds, he was a seventh palace.
